reviews.review_msg: I am fairly certain this was one of the first classes Professor Boyle has taught, and I think she did a fantastic job! She is a tough marker, but presents very clear expectations. Her lectures were varied with guest speakers, presentations, documentaries and discussions. A fantastic class all around! GSWS department, you better keep her!

Ellexis brings an incredibly varied background to the table: Human kinetics, chef training, and gender studies. Made for a crazy interesting Masculinity Studies class. She's a tough marker, but gives you a rubric beforehand. Really enjoyed her perspective on things, and she was always super kind and approachable.
